import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function RenderSignUp () { const Navigate = useNavigate(); async function signup () { // sends username, password from input server then creates s3 bucket in username and stores details on mongo const username = document.getElementById('signupusername').value;// get username password and email const password = document.getElementById('signuppass').value; const email = document.getElementById('signupemail').value; const Posts = [] let signupdata = { Username: username, Password: password, Email: email, LastCommentNum : 0, // set comment count for index Posts: Posts } let options = { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }, body: JSON.stringify(signupdata), } let signinurl = 'http://192.168.1.93:4001/signup/' + username let response = await fetch(signinurl, options) let convert = await response.json () console.log("User signup completed created document is:") console.log(convert) if ( response.status === 401 || response.status === 400){// handle not a match alert("Your username is in use please try another") // Navigate("/signIn") //return false } else if ( response.status === 200){ // if password is a match return auth'd username console.log("signed up pword correct stored in local", "authjwt="+convert.token) //document.cookie = "authjwt="+convert.token; // store data in cookie localStorage.setItem('jwt_token', convert.token) // Store JWT in storage alert("Welcome to the club! Please setup your profile") Navigate ("/editProfile") } } return( <> Sign Up
Username
Password
Email
Already a member? Sign in now
); }
